1158080.name: Headliner: NoviNews Official Soundtrack
1158080.description:
Official Soundtrack for Headliner: NoviNews, Headliner NoviNews, award-winning adventure where you control the news and its impact on society, your friends and career. Different choices lead to unique combinations of endings. Share your story with the community, and see what the players before you did.

All files are in the following directory: ~Steam/steamapps/common/Headliner NoviNews/Soundtrack/



Title
  • Sodium Vapor

Intro
  • Blood Guts and Pain v2

Office
  • Hypersaw in the hip hop land
  • Post Op
  • Bathing in Whiskey
  • Georgia at Night

Streets of Novistan
  • Beer Run
  • Do not fear the light
  • Dreamer 2
  • Electric Piano Man
  • Aluode Raining in Miami
  • Hammer of Jan (v2)

Home Sweet Home
  • Acapulco Shore
  • Embraced by the thorns

Street Day 4 and 7 Theme
  • I want to love forever instrumental

Street Day 5 Theme
  • Five minutes of why

Street Day 9 Theme
  • East meets west

Henri the Homeless' Theme
  • Hammer and nails

The Incident
  • Overture: Egmont Overture Finale
  • After: Anomaly
  • Home: Bad Morning

Justin's Comedy Show
  • Asian Vlog Muzak

Justin's Theme (Home)
  • Sad: Even Slower
  • Happy: Background Music 2

Evie's Theme
  • Epiano Dreams

Fire
  • Auf Wiedersehen Questionmark

RudyMart Fire
  • Buddha on Broadway

Riot
  • Holographic mirage from another dimension

Day 8, Security
  • They're Closing In

Assassination

Government Agent
  • Eight on Eight

Finale Themes (Day 12)
  • WAR: Halloween Rap
  • ASSASSINATION: Dance Me to the end of the blues
  • IMPEACHMENT: Gambler on the run

Ending (Office)

Ending (Street)
  • 1st I lost my money

Misc

  • Exercise in futility
